sasquatch

why choose between R and SAS when you can have them both?

Installation

You can install the development version of sasquatch like so:

pak::pkg_install("ryanzomorrodi/sasquatch")

sasquatch is currently in a very rudimentary form, but it is not hard to use once you have saspy installed and set up. Feel free to contribute by adding an issue or pull request.

Don’t have a SAS License? You can still set up saspy with SAS OnDemand for Academics.
